page.title: 02Cotton End Housing
page.content: The majority of houses in Cotton End are fairly equally divided between owner occupied and rented accommodation. There are about 500 households most of whom live in modest, average looking houses of little particular architectural interest. There is a block of flats at the southern edge of the village which is particularly unattractive with their flat roofs and bright blue exterior paintwork. However, this block does contain some rather fine old farmhouses and small cottages, many of which are listed buildings.
